item.title: To my cherished one
item.description: Perplexity and Epiphany For a long time, I felt a little tired and unfair because of my career and life, as well as my emotional experience. In those days, I felt that I was the victim, and I couldn’t understand my thoughts, my mood was comforted, and my emotions couldn’t be vented. Because I really like it, and I really fell into the quagmire of love, so I really want to get praise and encouragement from the other half.

item.title: Original intention of blogging
item.description: Write at the beginning For a long time, I felt that I should write something, not only as a technician, but also as a living person. In modern society, most people do not have a place where they can vent their feelings freely, and so do authors. Therefore, my original intention to write a blog is largely because I have a pure land where I can vent freely on the Internet.
